data.text: @SenCortezMasto nuclear is the way to go
@SenCortezMasto Produce solar in Nevada and screw China.  Get Nevada an oul refinery so we can can say screw off to Scumbag democrat California
@upwithusvegas @SenCortezMasto Nuclear is even better than fossil fuels when it comes to efficiency.
@SenCortezMasto No,  it doesn't. It only makes money for China.
@SenCortezMasto How are your policies helping the people in Vermont when the buses that cost 8 billion can’t work in the winter?

@SenCortezMasto Because it’s crap. We need a reliable base load power and that is not renewables. You want renewables off grid your house you can pay for it. We’ve had enough of playing for failures and then not having enough power
@SenCortezMasto You are a fool... and the American people are on to you and your ilk... Quit lying and do us all a favor and retire.
@SenCortezMasto Because people like you have no idea what you’re talking about and are the furthest from know anything about energy.
@SenCortezMasto No more money for you DC sewer rats to steal from tax payers and not use for "projects."
